author: cmpilato
msg: (svnsync_cmd_table): Uh.  Try to make the 'svnsync init' usage

author: cmpilato
msg: Followup to r38800 by renaming 'svnsync init's new --force option to
--allow-non-empty instead.  This is to prevent the continuation of a
discouraged trend found in the 'svn' tool where --force is found
everywhere, but conveys no precise information to users and means
something slightly different for each subcommand.
(svnsync_cmd_table): Update usage of 'initialize' to track option rename.

author: hwright

author: hwright
msg: Rev a Subversion-public API to take a wc context and absolute path instead
of an access baton and relative path.
(svn_wc__del_tree_conflict): Update parameters to use a context/abspath and
(svn_wc__del_tree_conflict): Update params, assert an absolute path, and
just use the information provided by the caller.
(tree_conflict_on_add): Update this caller to the above.
